Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is great for me to get general knowledge of things I didn't know, I tend to have a lot of questions. Usually teachers have very limited time, so questions that came up while studying alone, couldn't be answered immediately.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I can use GenAI for feedback anytime and anywhere, usually alongside my study sessions. While a teacher has limited time. However, a teacher would give a more suitable answer for my needs, while GenAI would give a more general answer

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI oftentimes give the same answers, just in a different phrase. However, often times it could explain difficult topics I didn't understand when reading a study material, an activity that is often times done after class without the teacher.
